short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import and export your configurations for the Lendal Pro Trader indicator on Trading View.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Import and export your configurations fro the Lendal Pro Trader indicator on Trading view!

Now after you create a configuration in the Lendal Pro Tester you can export it and easily import it to the Lendal Pro Trader. No more needs to refill the form! Export and share your configurations with friends or use a configuration that has been successful for someone else.

***
0.0.6 - 2024-06-04
- Update for fixing DOM changes to the asset and timeframe titles

***
0.0.5 
- Update for fixing changes to asset/timeframe/exchange dom structure
- Add in checks to gracefully handle future changes

***
0.0.4
- Add form checksum value to config
- Handle setting of session time
- Base whether Lendal indicator form on version.
- Disable OK button while form is being populated.
- Bug fix for DOM changes

***
Update 0.0.3
- Bug fix for change in DOM structure of indicator form tabs

Update 0.0.2
- Adds a form checksum value based on applicable values in the form. Allows quick comparison between Pro Tester and Pro Trader form values.
- Removes extension support in the pre-load forms.
- Updates default export filename to be "[memo] - [exchange] - [asset] - [timeframe].json"
- Prevents benchmark modal activation if no benchmark exists in config.
- Adds extension version in config for future compatibility considerations.
